basics.name: Devin Argenta
basics.label: Front End Web Developer
basics.summary: Currently a Senior Front End Web Developer at Finalsite, developing award winning websites for national and international schools. I have over five years of professional experience, with an entrepreneurial background. I have a strong resolution for problem solving, and I strive for the next challenge. In my spare time I am finding new ways to further my learning, and become a better developer.

work.summary: Working as a Senior Developer gave me the opportunity to help other developers work smarter and more efficiently. I was able to spend more time going over new solutions to old problems, enhance our internal build tools, and help our software team find new ways to increase our productivity with the software. Additionally, I implemented new build features into our workflow, including an optimized gulp build, and a strong git workflow.
highlights: Continually improved our development workflow, taking charge of our build process and tooling
Lead transition to a git based workflow
Built “Best In Class” websites for prestige clients
Collaborated on CMS with development team on inefficienes in our workflow and potential software improvments

work.summary: Developed over 40 responsive websites using SCSS, HTML, JS and build tools like Grunt, Gulp, and more.
highlights: Front End Web Devlopment for a proprietary CMS using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/jQuery
Front End framework management, using Grunt/Gulp and SCSS
